description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GDPR Info Cookie Notice & Consent Banner for GDPR & CCPA Compliance allows Stored XSS. This issue affects Cookie Notice & Consent Banner for GDPR & CCPA Compliance: from n/a through 1.7.11.

product.name: Cookie Notice & Consent Banner for GDPR & CCPA Compliance
